name: VoiceGate Technologies
description:
Founded in the year 1998 by Syed Mohammed VoiceGate India Private Limited is an organization with a passion for cutting edge Mobile Application Development, Data and Voice communication technology. It is this passion and drive that has made us a pioneer provider of Enterprise mobility, mobile app development and VAS platforms solutions for Telcos across India and overseas.
VoiceGate has a proven track record of being a pioneer in mobile apps and Voice industry for over 14 years.Technology is an inherent strength of VoiceGate. We develop ready-to-embed custom software applications for telecom hardware, custom mobile application development, app porting to cater the modern Telecom world for smartphones.
